
Two users reused a prime when generating their RSA keys. ## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{un1uj5x3}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 222639980602059040487734655672662222625001494190623170436570330765078375695551338607080378200239842365367217370672463389054155137804480642136102907373600903557951092955125254475562722668734348906810543771002289094165944019966266302
vulnerability: shared prime
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common prime, computing GCD(n, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
